00066 BOOLEAN NoEnemiesInSight( )
00067 {
00068       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
00069       INT32                                                       cnt;
00070 
00071       // Loop through our guys
00072       // End the turn of player charactors
00073       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00074 
00075   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
00076   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
00077       {       
00078             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00079             {
00080                   if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt != 0 )
00081                   {
00082                         return( FALSE );  
00083                   }
00084             }
00085       }
00086       
00087       return( TRUE );
00088 }

00090 void MusicStopCallback( void *pData );

00092 //********************************************************************************
00093 // MusicPlay
00094 //
00095 //          Starts up one of the tunes in the music list.
00096 //
00097 //    Returns:    TRUE if the music was started, FALSE if an error occurred
00098 //
00099 //********************************************************************************
00100 BOOLEAN MusicPlay(UINT32 uiNum)
00101 {
00102 #ifndef WINDOWED_MODE
00103 
00104 SOUNDPARMS spParms;     
00105 
00106       if(fMusicPlaying)
00107             MusicStop();
00108       
00109       memset(&spParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
00110       spParms.uiPriority=PRIORITY_MAX;
00111       spParms.uiVolume=0;
00112       spParms.uiLoop=1;   // Lesh: only 1 line added
00113 
00114       spParms.EOSCallback = MusicStopCallback;
00115 
00116       //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "About to call SoundPlayStreamedFile" );
00117 
00118       uiMusicHandle=SoundPlayStreamedFile(szMusicList[uiNum], &spParms);
00119 
00120       if(uiMusicHandle!=SOUND_ERROR)
00121       {
00122             //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Music PLay %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode  ) );
00123 
00124             gfMusicEnded                        = FALSE;
00125             fMusicPlaying=TRUE;
00126             MusicFadeIn();
00127             return(TRUE);
00128       }
00129 
00130       //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Music PLay %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode  ) );
00131 
00132 
00133 #endif
00134 
00135       return(FALSE);
00136 }
00137 
00138 //********************************************************************************
00139 // MusicSetVolume
00140 //
00141 //          Sets the volume on the currently playing music.
00142 //
00143 //    Returns:    TRUE if the volume was set, FALSE if an error occurred
00144 //
00145 //********************************************************************************
00146 BOOLEAN MusicSetVolume(UINT32 uiVolume)
00147 {
00148   INT32 uiOldMusicVolume = uiMusicVolume;
00149 
00150 #ifndef WINDOWED_MODE
00151 
00152       uiMusicVolume=__min(uiVolume, 127);
00153 
00154       if(uiMusicHandle!=NO_SAMPLE)
00155       {
00156     // get volume and if 0 stop music!
00157     if ( uiMusicVolume == 0 )
00158     {
00159       gfDontRestartSong = TRUE;
00160       MusicStop( );
00161       return( TRUE );
00162     }
00163 
00164             SoundSetVolume(uiMusicHandle, uiMusicVolume);
00165 
00166             return(TRUE);
00167       }
00168   
00169   // If here, check if we need to re-start music
00170   // Have we re-started?
00171   if ( uiMusicVolume > 0 && uiOldMusicVolume == 0 )
00172   {
00173     StartMusicBasedOnMode( );
00174   }
00175 
00176 #endif
00177 
00178       return(FALSE);
00179 }

00188 //********************************************************************************
00189 UINT32 MusicGetVolume(void)

00191             return(uiMusicVolume);

00194 //********************************************************************************
00195 // MusicStop
00196 //
00197 //          Stops the currently playing music.
00198 //
00199 //    Returns:    TRUE if the music was stopped, FALSE if an error occurred
00200 //
00201 //********************************************************************************
00202 BOOLEAN MusicStop(void)
00203 {
00204 
00205 #ifndef WINDOWED_MODE
00206 
00207 
00208       if(uiMusicHandle!=NO_SAMPLE)
00209       {
00210             //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Music Stop %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode ) );
00211 
00212             SoundStop(uiMusicHandle);
00213             fMusicPlaying=FALSE;
00214             uiMusicHandle = NO_SAMPLE;
00215             return(TRUE);
00216       }
00217 
00218       //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Music Stop %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode ) );
00219 
00220 #endif
00221 
00222       return(FALSE);
00223 }

00228 //          Fades out the current song.
00229 //
00230 //    Returns:    TRUE if the music has begun fading, FALSE if an error occurred
00231 //
00232 //********************************************************************************
00233 BOOLEAN MusicFadeOut(void)
00234 {
00235       if(uiMusicHandle!=NO_SAMPLE)
00236       {
00237             fMusicFadingOut=TRUE;
00238             return(TRUE);
00239       }
00240       return(FALSE);
00241 }

00249 //

00255             fMusicFadingIn=TRUE;
00256             return(TRUE);
00257       }
00258       return(FALSE);

00261 //********************************************************************************
00262 // MusicPoll
00263 //
00264 //          Handles any maintenance the music system needs done. Should be polled from
00265 //    the main loop, or somewhere with a high frequency of calls.
00266 //
00267 //    Returns:    TRUE always
00268 //
00269 //********************************************************************************
00270 BOOLEAN MusicPoll( BOOLEAN fForce )
00271 {
00272       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll");
00273 
00274 #ifndef WINDOWED_MODE
00275       INT32 iVol;
00276 
00277       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: SoundServiceStreams ");
00278       SoundServiceStreams();
00279       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: SoundServiceRandom ");
00280       SoundServiceRandom();
00281 
00282       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: Handle Sound every sound overhead time");
00283       // Handle Sound every sound overhead time....
00284       if ( COUNTERDONE( MUSICOVERHEAD )  )
00285       {
00286       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: Reset counter");
00287             // Reset counter
00288             RESETCOUNTER( MUSICOVERHEAD );
00289 
00290             if(fMusicFadingIn)
00291             {
00292                   //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: music fading in");
00293                   if(uiMusicHandle!=NO_SAMPLE)
00294                   {
00295                         iVol=SoundGetVolume(uiMusicHandle);
00296                         iVol=__min( (INT32)uiMusicVolume, iVol+gbFadeSpeed );
00297                         SoundSetVolume(uiMusicHandle, iVol);
00298                         if(iVol==(INT32)uiMusicVolume)
00299                         {
00300                               fMusicFadingIn=FALSE;
00301                               gbFadeSpeed = 1;
00302                         }
00303                   }
00304             }
00305             else if(fMusicFadingOut)
00306             {
00307                   //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: music fading out");
00308                   if(uiMusicHandle!=NO_SAMPLE)
00309                   {
00310                         iVol=SoundGetVolume(uiMusicHandle);
00311                         iVol=(iVol >=1)? iVol-gbFadeSpeed : 0;
00312 
00313                         iVol=__max( (INT32)iVol, 0 );
00314 
00315                         SoundSetVolume(uiMusicHandle, iVol);
00316                         if(iVol==0)
00317                         {
00318                               MusicStop();
00319                               fMusicFadingOut=FALSE;
00320                               gbFadeSpeed = 1;
00321                         }
00322                   }
00323             }
00324 
00325       //#endif
00326 
00327             if ( gfMusicEnded )
00328             {
00329                   //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: music ended");
00330                   // OK, based on our music mode, play another!
00331                   //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Music End Loop %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode ) );
00332 
00333                   // If we were in victory mode, change!
00334                   if ( gbVictorySongCount == 1 || gbDeathSongCount == 1 )
00335                   {
00336                         if ( gbDeathSongCount == 1 && guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00337                         {
00338                               CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
00339                         }
00340 
00341                         if ( gbVictorySongCount == 1 )
00342                         {
00343                                     SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
00344                         }
00345                   }
00346                   else 
00347                   {
00348                         if ( !gfDontRestartSong )
00349                         {
00350                               //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll: don't restart song, StartMusicBasedOnMode");
00351                               StartMusicBasedOnMode( );
00352                         }
00353                   }
00354 
00355                   gfMusicEnded = FALSE;
00356       gfDontRestartSong = FALSE;
00357             }
00358       }
00359 #endif
00360 
00361       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"MusicPoll done");
00362       return(TRUE);
00363 }

00366 BOOLEAN SetMusicMode( UINT8 ubMusicMode )
00367 {
00368       static INT8 bPreviousMode = 0;
00369 
00370 
00371       // OK, check if we want to restore
00372       if ( ubMusicMode == MUSIC_RESTORE )
00373       {
00374     if ( bPreviousMode == MUSIC_TACTICAL_VICTORY || bPreviousMode == MUSIC_TACTICAL_DEATH )
00375     {
00376       bPreviousMode = MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING;
00377     }
00378 
00379             ubMusicMode = bPreviousMode;
00380       }
00381       else
00382       {
00383             // Save previous mode...
00384             bPreviousMode = gubOldMusicMode;
00385       }
00386  
00387       // if different, start a new music song
00388       if ( gubOldMusicMode != ubMusicMode )
00389       {
00390             // Set mode....
00391             gubMusicMode = ubMusicMode;
00392 
00393             //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Music New Mode %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode  ) );
00394 
00395             gbVictorySongCount = 0;
00396             gbDeathSongCount = 0;
00397 
00398             if(uiMusicHandle!=NO_SAMPLE  )
00399             {
00400                   // Fade out old music
00401                   MusicFadeOut( );
00402             }
00403             else
00404             {
00405                   // Change music!
00406                   StartMusicBasedOnMode( );
00407             }
00408 
00409       }
00410       gubOldMusicMode = gubMusicMode;
00411 
00412       return( TRUE );
00413 }

00415 
00416 BOOLEAN StartMusicBasedOnMode( )
00417 {
00418       static BOOLEAN fFirstTime = TRUE;
00419 
00420       if ( fFirstTime )
00421       {
00422             fFirstTime = FALSE;
00423 
00424             bNothingModeSong = NOTHING_A_MUSIC + (INT8)Random( 4 );
00425 
00426             bEnemyModeSong = TENSOR_A_MUSIC + (INT8)Random( 3 );
00427 
00428             bBattleModeSong = BATTLE_A_MUSIC + (INT8)Random( 2 );
00429 
00430       }
00431 
00432 
00433       //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "StartMusicBasedOnMode() %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode ) );
00434 
00435       // Setup a song based on mode we're in!
00436       switch( gubMusicMode )
00437       {
00438             case MUSIC_MAIN_MENU:
00439                   // ATE: Don't fade in 
00440                   gbFadeSpeed = (INT8)uiMusicVolume;
00441                   MusicPlay( MENUMIX_MUSIC );
00442                   break;
00443 
00444             case MUSIC_LAPTOP:
00445                   gbFadeSpeed = (INT8)uiMusicVolume;
00446                   MusicPlay( MARIMBAD2_MUSIC );
00447                   break;
00448 
00449             case MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING:
00450                   // ATE: Don't fade in 
00451                   gbFadeSpeed = (INT8)uiMusicVolume;
00452                   if( gfUseCreatureMusic )
00453                   {
00454                         MusicPlay( CREEPY_MUSIC );
00455                   }
00456                   else
00457                   {
00458                         MusicPlay( bNothingModeSong );
00459                         bNothingModeSong = NOTHING_A_MUSIC + (INT8)Random( 4 );
00460                   }
00461                   break;
00462 
00463             case MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT:
00464                   // ATE: Don't fade in EnemyPresent...
00465                   gbFadeSpeed = (INT8)uiMusicVolume;
00466                   if( gfUseCreatureMusic )
00467                   {
00468                         MusicPlay( CREEPY_MUSIC );
00469                   }
00470                   else
00471                   {
00472                         MusicPlay( bEnemyModeSong );
00473                         bEnemyModeSong = TENSOR_A_MUSIC + (INT8)Random( 3 );
00474                   }
00475                   break;
00476 
00477             case MUSIC_TACTICAL_BATTLE:
00478                   // ATE: Don't fade in 
00479                   gbFadeSpeed = (INT8)uiMusicVolume;
00480                   if( gfUseCreatureMusic )
00481                   {
00482                         MusicPlay( CREATURE_BATTLE_MUSIC );
00483                   }
00484                   else
00485                   {
00486                         MusicPlay( bBattleModeSong );
00487                   }
00488                   bBattleModeSong = BATTLE_A_MUSIC + (INT8)Random( 2 );
00489                   break;
00490 
00491             case MUSIC_TACTICAL_VICTORY:
00492 
00493                   // ATE: Don't fade in EnemyPresent...
00494                   gbFadeSpeed = (INT8)uiMusicVolume;
00495                   MusicPlay( TRIUMPH_MUSIC );
00496                   gbVictorySongCount++;
00497 
00498                   if( gfUseCreatureMusic && !gbWorldSectorZ )
00499                   { //We just killed all the creatures that just attacked the town.
00500                         gfUseCreatureMusic = FALSE;
00501                   }
00502                   break;
00503 
00504             case MUSIC_TACTICAL_DEATH:
00505 
00506                   // ATE: Don't fade in EnemyPresent...
00507                   gbFadeSpeed = (INT8)uiMusicVolume;
00508                   MusicPlay( DEATH_MUSIC );
00509                   gbDeathSongCount++;
00510                   break;
00511 
00512             default:
00513                   MusicFadeOut( );
00514                   break;
00515       }
00516 
00517       return( TRUE );
00518 }

00521 void MusicStopCallback( void *pData )
00522 {
00523       //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Music EndCallback %d %d", uiMusicHandle, gubMusicMode  ) );
00524 
00525       gfMusicEnded  = TRUE;
00526       uiMusicHandle = NO_SAMPLE;
00527 
00528       //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Music EndCallback completed" );
00529 }

00532 void SetMusicFadeSpeed( INT8 bFadeSpeed )

00536 
00537 void FadeMusicForXSeconds( UINT32 uiDelay )
00538 {
00539       INT16 sNumTimeSteps, sNumVolumeSteps;
00540 
00541       // get # time steps in delay....
00542       sNumTimeSteps = (INT16)( uiDelay / 10 );
00543 
00544       // Devide this by music volume...
00545       sNumVolumeSteps = (INT16)( uiMusicVolume / sNumTimeSteps );
00546 
00547       // Set fade delay...
00548       SetMusicFadeSpeed( (INT8)sNumVolumeSteps );
00549 }

00556       //SetPendingNewScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
